en.name: Juan Tricoli
en.role: Technical Specialist | Support & Operations | Problem Solver
en.txtAbout: I am a versatile technical professional with extensive experience in support, troubleshooting, and operational maintenance. I excel at diagnosing and resolving technical issues, providing both remote and on-site assistance, and ensuring smooth operations in various environments.
en.exp1Desc:
📅 2020 - 2023 | Buenos Aires, Argentina
✅ Diagnosed and repaired technical issues in computer systems and specialized equipment.
✅ Delivered both remote and on-site support, resolved incidents, and conducted preventive maintenance.
en.exp2Desc: ✅ Provided customer support in retail and service sectors, honing communication, conflict resolution, and teamwork skills.
en.skill1: ✅ Technical Support & Troubleshooting – Diagnosing and resolving technical issues effectively.
en.skill2: ✅ Equipment & System Maintenance – Repair and optimization of technical systems.
en.skill3: ✅ Technical Infrastructure Management – Setup, configuration, and troubleshooting of essential systems.
en.skill4: ✅ Customer Service – Delivering effective support and quality solutions.
en.skill5: ✅ Continuous Improvement – Adapting to new technologies and methodologies.
en.edu3: 📌 Electronics Specialization – EEST N4 Base Aérea Palomar (2016 - 2019)
en.lang2: 🗣️ English (Intermediate - continuously improving for professional contexts)
en.proj1: 📱 AR Anatomy (2023) – Award-winning project demonstrating innovative technical solutions and interactive design.
en.proj2: 💻 Technical Support Project (Ongoing) – Freelance initiative focused on diagnosing and repairing technical systems.
en.proj3: 🛠 Operational Efficiency Project (2022 - Present) – Initiative dedicated to optimizing system performance for small businesses.
en.contactDesc: For inquiries or collaborations, call me at +54 11 6567-7996 or email tricolijuan3@gmail.com.
en.msgPlaceholder: Tell me more about your inquiry...
en.formError: Please fill in all required fields.

es.name: Juan Tricoli

es.exp1Title: 🔧 EREXIT3D - Especialista en Soporte y Operaciones Técnicas
es.exp1Desc:
📅 2020 - 2023 | Buenos Aires, Argentina
✅ Diagnóstico y reparación de incidencias técnicas en sistemas y equipos especializados.
es.exp2Desc: ✅ Soporte al cliente en sectores de retail y servicios, desarrollando habilidades en comunicación y resolución de conflictos.
es.skill1: ✅ Soporte Técnico & Resolución de Problemas – Diagnóstico y solución eficiente de incidencias.
es.skill2: ✅ Mantenimiento de Equipos & Sistemas – Reparación y optimización de sistemas.
es.skill3: ✅ Gestión de Infraestructura – Configuración y solución de problemas en sistemas esenciales.
es.skill4: ✅ Atención al Cliente – Proveer soluciones y soporte de calidad.
es.skill5: ✅ Mejora Continua – Adaptación a nuevas tecnologías.

es.proj1: 📱 AR Anatomy (2023) – Proyecto galardonado con soluciones técnicas innovadoras.
es.proj2: 💻 Proyecto de Soporte Técnico (En Curso) – Iniciativa freelance para diagnóstico y reparación de sistemas.
es.proj3: 🛠 Proyecto de Eficiencia Operativa (2022 - Actualidad) – Optimización del rendimiento de sistemas para pequeñas empresas.
